name: Hazelcast Component For Apache Camel
shortDescription: The Hazelcast component for Apache Camel allows you to work with the Hazelcast distributed data grid/cache.
longDescription: The Hazelcast component for Apache Camel allows you to work with the Hazelcast distributed data grid/cache. If you have enabled multicast on your network, you can run a cluster with a hundred nodes with no extra configuration. Hazelcast can be simply configured to add additional features like n copies between nodes (default is 1), cache persistence, network configuration (if needed), near cache, eviction and so on.
